task.en: Let AirDrop show in the menu bar.
task.zh: 让隔空投送显示在菜单栏中。
task.ar: اجعل AirDrop يظهر في شريط القائمة.
task.ja: AirDrop をメニューバーに表示させてください。

pre_command: osascript -e 'tell app "System Settings" to quit' && defaults write com.apple.controlcenter "NSStatusItem Visible AirDrop" -int 0
grading_command: defaults read com.apple.controlcenter "NSStatusItem Visible AirDrop" 2>/dev/null | grep -q "1" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Control Center" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "控制中心" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "مركز التحكم" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "コントロールセンター" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Пункт управления" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "System Settings" && echo "True" || echo "False"
